author: Ailin Quinlan
title: West Cork on holidaymakers: ‘We’re hoping they won’t come’
description: Kilcrohane usually relies on visitors but the usual welcome is temporarily suspended
content:
Businesswoman Elaine Spillane normally swims year-round with a boisterous group of women called the Chilli Dippers.
However, each day since the start of the Covid-19 crisis, Spillane has entered the lapping waves alone from a deserted pier near her home on t… [+5070 chars]
